data.summary_text:
Autism is all grown up now, and it isn't always pretty.
Autistic adults face a multitude of significant, endemic challenges.

data.main_image_alt_text: Dr. Bones McCoy trying to safe Klingon General Gorkon in the Star Trek movie _The Undiscovered Country_.

data.summary_text: Many autistic adults in Oregon are invisible, marginalized, and struggling. We can fix this.
data.main_image_alt_text: Chart showing population of adults in oregon receiving I/DD services and/or autistic.

data.summary_text: Autism is lifelong. Support and research haven't been. We are just starting to learn what successful adulthood looks like for autistic people.
data.main_image_alt_text: Plot of autism research funding by category from 2010 to 2020. Data from the IACC.

data.summary_text: The autistic community has the talent and ability to create solutions NOW. “Actually Autistic” adults are not what you see on TV.
Working from within, we can make an immediate impact by activating and empowering the autistic community in Oregon to focus on attainable objectives.
